channel.title: Helix on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Helix on RD's Blog

item.title: Conformational Coupling Across the Plasma Membrane in Activation of the EGF Receptor
item.description: An in-depth study of EGFR activation focusing on transmembrane and juxtamembrane coupling, density-dependent activation, and the role of the plasma membrane in maintaining autoinhibition.
